entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
